blockchain.name: osu coin
blockchain.desc:
sahuang, y4nhu1

Another baby baby blockchain challenge :)

The osu!coin is a cryptocurrency that was created by the osu! team as an April Fools joke. It's totally worthless... So why am I still holding millions of it?

blockchain.name: rankpls
blockchain.desc:
Triacontakai

I want to get my map ranked, but I suck at mapping. Can you help?


# Setup

!! siced from idekctf2023/babysolana chals !!
!! too lazy to setup anchor myself so thx <3 !!

Use `framework/` to locally setup the challenge
Use `framework-solve/` to solve the challenge locally and remotely

Edit `framework-solve/solve/programs/solve/src/lib.rs` with your exploit


## Deployment
- Run `docker build -t solana-challenge-2 .` in the `framework` directory
- Run `docker run -d -p 1337:1337 solana-challenge-2`


## Building the solution
- Run `build_solution.sh` in the `solution` directory
- Run `target/release/solve-framework`

blockchain.name: scorechain
blockchain.desc:
Triacontakai

Snipe mr nathan on osu and claim the bounty in the very secure blockchain bancho!


# Setup

!! siced from idekctf2023/babysolana chals !!
!! too lazy to setup anchor myself so thx <3 !!

Use `framework/` to locally setup the challenge
Use `framework-solve/` to solve the challenge locally and remotely

Edit `framework-solve/solve/programs/solve/src/lib.rs` with your exploit


## Deployment
- Run `docker build -t solana-challenge-2 .` in the `framework` directory
- Run `docker run -d -p 1337:1337 solana-challenge-2`


## Building the solution
- Run `build_solution.sh` in the `solution` directory
- Run `target/release/solve-framework`

crypto.name: ROSSAU
crypto.desc:
BrokenAppendix

My friend really likes sending me hidden messages, something about a public key with n = 5912718291679762008847883587848216166109 and e = 876603837240112836821145245971528442417. What is the name of player with the user ID of the private key exponent? (Wrap with osu{})

crypto.name: korean offline mafia
crypto.desc:
quin

I've been hardstuck for years, simply not able to rank up... so I decided to try and infiltrate the Korean offline mafia for some help. I've gotten so close, getting in contact, but now, to prove I'm part of the group, I need to prove I know every group member's ID (without giving it away over this insecure communication). The only trouble is... I don't! Can you help?

crypto.name: lucky roll gaming
crypto.desc:
willwam

my friend gamillie keeps losing their rolls!! help them predict when to roll so they can secure first pick and win their match!!

crypto.name: roll
crypto.desc:
quin

To help you in your next tourney, you can practice rolling against me! But you'll have to do better than just winning the roll to impress me...

(DM me !help on osu! to get started!)

crypto.name: secret map
crypto.desc:
quin

Here's an old, unfinished map of mine (any collabers?). I tried adding an new diff but it seems to have gotten corrupted - can you help me recover it?

forensic.name: abnormal life
forensic.desc:
sahuang

Few people farm their own map for BP1. I did. That was played 6 years ago though.

Recently I retried the top difficulty and got a terrible score. At least I passed the map with HDDT...But what happend to the life bar on the score screen?

Wrap the string in osu{}. Flag format is osu\{[A-Z0-9_]+\}.

forensic.name: nathan on osu
forensic.desc:
sahuang, hollow

Here's an old screenshot of chat logs between sahuang and Nathan on hollow's Windows machine, but a crucial part of the conversation seems to be cropped out... Can you help to recover the flag from the future?

forensic.name: out of click
forensic.desc:
BrokenAppendix

I love playing this map but recently I noticed that some of the circles seem off. Can you help me find the locations of the weird circles?

forensic.name: out of slide
forensic.desc:
BrokenAppendix

Flag should fit this regex: osu\{[A-Z_]+\}.

misc.name: egg pain
misc.desc:
sahuang

I hid a message in my unfinished diff for ParagonX9 - Chaoz Fantasy. Could you figure it out?

misc.name: i hate anime girls
misc.desc:
segal

osu! players love their anime girls. But I HATE anime girls. So much so that I trained a neural network to filter my map backgrounds. But tbh, I really want to pp farm hitorigoto and my map filter won't let me. Can you fool it?

misc.name: replayflow
misc.desc:
segal

neural radiance fields are so efficient for 3d scene representation so surely a 2d temporal flow field would work great! i trained a neural net to represent my replay cursor movement. it's parameterized by time (float in seconds), x, and y coord (osu map coordinates) and it outputs (dx/dt, dy/dt) at each coordinate. can you get my replay?

osint.name: time traveler
osint.desc:
strell

can you see into the past? some time ago, there was another flag somewhere.

start your search here: https://osu.ppy.sh/users/11118671

NOTE: this is also a web challenge, don't expect to solve using just traditional osint techniques

osint.name: when you see it
osint.desc:
sahuang

My friend is so obsessed with osu! that he refused to play any CTF! Today he came to me and sent me this weird GIF, can you understand what he is trying to tell me?

Hint:

    He told me this is important at the beginning: "Who is the person in the meme?"
    Flag has 3 parts, combining them in order gives the full flag.

osu.name: eat healthy
osu.desc:
quin

Something's not quite right with this osu! map. What secrets is it hiding?

osu.name: futsuu
osu.desc:
quin

Check out my new taiko map for beginners! Flag matches [a-z0-9_]+, and make sure to wrap it in the osu{} format.

P.S. I would've named this Kantan but this technically doesn't meet the ranking strain guidelines for Kantan... so Futsuu it is

osu.name: osu crossword
osu.desc:
sahuang

Come solve my osu!crossword challenge! Once you completed the puzzle and obtained the hash, submit it to remote server for verification.

Note: All characters you enter in crossword should be in lowercase.

osu.name: slidering flag
osu.desc:
sahuang

The GD I made was ranked in 2020. I am now releasing an unrankable version. I wonder why it looks so weird compared to the ranked diff, especially...the sliders?

Note: All characters you see should be uppercase, including flag format. Flag should fit this regex: OSU\{[A-Z_]+\}.

osu.name: smoked
osu.desc:
sahuang

Imagine getting flag from simply watching a replay...

pwn.name: betterthanu
pwn.desc:
triacontakai

I bet you can't beat a single one of my plays!

pwn.name: miss analyzer
pwn.desc:
strell

I made a program to analyze the misses in my replays!

pwn.name: osu v8
pwn.desc:
rycbar

You’re probably accessing the osu website with Chromium, right?


## Build

based on `8cf17a14a78cc1276eb42e1b4bb699f705675530`

pwn.name: osujail
pwn.desc:
hoifanrd

osu has been jailed in a pyjail! You have infiltrated into the jail and you have to save osu!

rev.name: SAT before osu
rev.desc:
BrokenAppendix

My mom won't let me play osu if I don't study for the SAT but this looks nothing like it! Please help me! T^T

rev.name: ecs catch
rev.desc:
enscribe

During his sophomore year of high school, enscribe made a really bad osu!catch clone for his final project in his Exploring Computer Science class. It was his first time on Unity, but it has some charm to it!

Receive an SS (with maximum score) on "Bakamitai", the hardest map, to receive the flag. Shouldn't be too difficult, right?

Note: An SS is not enough! The remote has additional checks for specific scoring (the maximum score if SS'ed "legitimately").

Note: This executable is built for x86 Windows.

rev.name: scorev3
rev.desc:
sahuang

I just invented scorev3, the new osu! meta. Imagine the score you gained changes over time...That just adds more fun to the leaderboard races.

I'm giving you the binary so you can test it out. Please also verify the program with some inputs! Once you did that, I will be happy to give you the flag.

web.name: pp ranking
web.desc:
strell

can you get to the top of the leaderboard? good luck getting past my anticheat...

web.name: profile page
web.desc:
strell

customize your osu! profile page!

web.name: profile page revenge
web.desc:
strell

ok, i learned my lesson. good luck exploiting my profile site now!
